name: Guilty (itch)
description:
Play as a strapping young lad looking to find his way in the world.

In this coming of age narrative adventure, play as the unlikely hero everyone deserves. Reform the missing connection of your late mother by venturing into the sites of a tragedy.

Credits:

Art and designed by: Flowoop

Programmed and designed by: Simon 

https://simoncurtis.itch.io/

Battle Design, Sound Effect by: Darren 

https://darrenkwan.itch.io/

Background music by: 7AM
